title: Hundred Points Symbol

adjectives: Scrupulous with regard to telling the truth.
Not disposed to cheat or defraud; not deceptive or fraudulent
Scrupulous with regard to telling the truth; not given to swindling, lying, or fraud; upright.
Not disposed to cheat or defraud.
Consistent with fact or reality; not false- B. Russell
Concurring with a given set of facts.
Conforming to the actual state of reality or fact; factually correct.
nouns: 100 is the natural number following 99 and preceding 101.
The cardinal number occurring after ninety-nine and before one hundred one, represented in Roman numerals as C and in Arabic numerals as 100.
The natural number following 99 and preceding 101

A period of 100 consecutive years; often specifically a numbered period with conventional start and end dates, e.g., the twentieth century, which stretches from (strictly) 1901 through 2000, or (informally) 1900 through 1999. The first century AD was from 1 to 100; a yearhundred.
A period of a hundred consecutive years; a century.
A century is one hundred years.
A tense of verbs used in describing action that has been completed (sometimes regarded as perfective aspect)
A verb form in certain languages
The perfect is a verb form found in certain languages.
Indicates that a certain task is complete.
A verb form indicating that an action or state has been completed at the present time, in the past, or will be completed in the future.

description:
100 emoji: the number one-hundred, written in red, underlined twice for emphasis.

Originating from the number 100 written on a school exam or paper to indicate a perfect score of 100 out of 100.  Teachers in Japan may also use a stamp in addition to the 100 mark, to indicate that a student has performed very well.

This 100 emoji is commonly used as a shorthand for 100%, with the usage meaning “keep it real” or a similar sentiment. A 100 emoji can be used to express pride or general acceptance of an idea.

In Snapchat, the 100 emoji appearing next to a fire emoji indicates a 100 day Snapstreak.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's '100 Points' emoji shines with a vibrant, bold '100' in bright red, set against a clean white background with a subtle glossy sheen. The numbers are rendered with crisp, defined edges and a touch of realistic lighting that makes them pop, a hallmark of Apple's 3D design. On Apple devices, this emoji conveys a strong sense of perfection, achievement, or complete agreement, often used to express full satisfaction or a top-tier rating.
